name: Ukraine 2022
description: Russia has decided to launch an invasion of Eastern Ukraine to establish an overland corridor from Southern Russia to the Crimea.  You play Ukraine, and you have 24 hours to organize the defense of your country.  NATO will not send troops to help you.  Assume that the Russian Air Force has total air superiority, and your conventional ground forces cannot maneuver once fighting starts.  You must also assume that your conventional forces will be completely outclassed by Russia's better equipped mechanized units.  Your best bet maybe to tie Russian forces down with trench warfare and an insurgency campaign.  Ukraine does have a talented special operations force, and plenty of veterans serving in light infantry units based in Western Ukraine.  With advanced weapons from NATO allies, these forces can infiltrate Russian lines, link up with partisans, and help liberate the East.  Good luck!
